reviewText: Rapidly descends into Ghost Stories to promote tourism Could have and should have been much more..
Great film, a lot of history and fun stories!
loved the scenery the history snd the folklore!

Waste of money.  I like to show scenic, educational and fun DVD's on our motor coach tours.  This was bad.  Unprofessional narration, black and white photos, (not real video of real places) and grainy appearance.  Looked like the photos of the lighthouses were from a Funk and Wagnals and zoomed in and out for effect.  Sigh.
